The accomodations are always clean and are updated! They also have a outdoorsports organasation, a lot of things to do at the lake and in the mountains surrounding the campsite I recomend this place to everyone, you or old, their things to do for everyone!

title: (4810) Guimarães - 17 N101-2

name: Parque Campismo de Penha
title: (4810) Parque Campismo de Penha
description: Great campsite with pool and restaurant. Very friendly staff. Shaded and in the trees. At the top of the gondola/cable car so perfect for visiting this beautiful little town and the rock structures of Penha.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
description: Just outside the entrance to the official camping (Parque Campismo da Penha) is a relatively large parking lot with convenient parking spaces of no fixed length. Lots of shade. Avoid driving uphill from the north (Quintas) as there are steep inclines and narrow streets. Better access if you drive from near Guimaraes center. Public toilets are a short walk away towards the main car park and church (unknown opening hours).

title: (4810-000) Guimaraes - Unnamed Road
description: On the road to the campsite, 200 meters before arriving at the parking lot, you will find a path that goes down to a picnic table. If you ever miss the path you will see the spot which is just below the road. We spent a very good night there in peace and the next day we took advantage of the shade of the trees and the walks and monuments nearby. The spot is only accessible for one small van.

title: (4810) Guimarães - N101-2
description: Free camper pitch, only for parking

title: (4610) - 2078 CM1160
description: Parking of the monastery "Santa Maria de Pombeiro" Overnight possible.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 354 Rua Professor Egas Moniz

title: (4810) Guimarães - 147 Rua José Faria Martins
description: Perfect place to visit the city. The parking lot is located directly at the valley station of the cable car to Serra da Pehna. The access road is not very wide. And the places quite narrow and short.

title: (4890) - 661 EM617
description: Parking park in Borba da Montanha, Celorico de Basto. A lot of boom to park, boom to stay. Secure calm. Cafes and supermarkets. Very nice agricultural area.

title: (4810-025) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu

title: (4820) São Gens - Rua do Viso

title: (4810) Guimarães - 220C Parque das Hortas

title: (4810) Guimarães - 15 Rua Dona Urraca
description: It is a fairly wide street where you can stop the motorhome, without traffic and overlooking the castle of Guimaraës. It is very quiet, the only thing that you can not park from 9:00 pm to 7:00 am, so you can not stay overnight. 50 meters from the castle.

title: (4800) - 1220 Rua Portelinha
description: Small roadside parking lot with little traffic. Nice and quiet view for the night. Slight slope but with the holds no problems. Facing a cute church whose bell tower remains silent at night. It nevertheless resumes at 7 a.m. so perfect if you take the road early, perhaps annoying if you get up late. No dogs barking at night, which seems to be rare enough in the area to clarify this.

The site has a black and grey discharge center and a water charging point.
There is a cafe and grocery store very close and a supermarket less than 5 minutes away with a gas station.
The owner is still carrying out the construction of the space but already allows its use.
Contact: 960085233

title: (4890) Carvalho - Unnamed Road
description: Simple spot with a very nice view, go up to the chapel. We struggled in this area to find a nice place to land, that's the best we found. It is asphalted, there is a watchtower with a guard, who watches the fires, we asked him if we could sleep there, no problem. Then few tourists this year in portugal because of the covid and few religious festivals, so we don't know how this place is normally.

name: MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
description: Microcamping, at "kiwis - ribas" private terrain. At ribas you can enjoy private, exclusive nature. For summer/ sunny season. With one or two places for small motorhome (van type)*. Can enjoy river with different small depths, barbecue area, small lake, cascade, kiwis shadow, solar shower, electricity. Exclusive and few people. Only reserved per group. For reservation contact first. (*if with a bigger motorhome and limoeiros house is available, you can park bigger van there, and camp on the valley. The street valley with high slope, more adaptable for smaller vans. access requires experienced driver). Can visit our farm, organic producst, applejuice, wine, rivermills, nearby.

title: (4830-657) Santo Emilião - 40 Rua da Fábrica

Between small parking and nature corner

access is easy
the edge of the shady water nice for a small breaststroke for children.
poor road
the communal employees crossed on our arrival gave us the green light ...

free but no service

name: Camping Quinta Valbom
title: (4890) Camping Quinta Valbom

The sanitary facilities are old, but clean! It's really worth it for some quiet nights in the middle of nature :) (unfortunately a very steep approach, could be a problem for big motorhomes)

name: MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN

Can visit rivermill, bathe on river, enjoy countryside. Taste our 100% organic applejuice (no added sugar niether conservatives), and enjoy the wild sheeps, geese, swing, and other places nearby, organic products, applejuice. Also have a parked caravan for support. For reservation please call or check the website.

title: (4615) - Rua Da Ribeirinha

title_short: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
description:
Microcamping, at "farm" private terrain. At our farm you can park one or two motorhome (small size), and enjoy shade and free animals. If you have a tent can alo camp near bouças. Mostly apple, we have the best organic applejuice, no sugar or conservatives added. Also can enjoy country nature, sheep's and geese on the wild. We have a swing by the lake. Can visit and bathe at our rivermill. We have other places to park. 
for reservation please call or check the web.

Possibility to swim in this beautiful river and make beautiful dives!

title: (4830-513) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 560 N205
description: Small rather flat car park, near the castle, a trash can. A very nice walk

title: (4765) Guardizela - 428 Rua da Calçada
description: Picnic park where you can make fire, some tables, parking for two vehicles (by the road) without water.

title: (4715) Braga -
description: Area with picnic tables and lots of trees! there's a little church.

name: Quinta da Magantinha
title: (4620-620) Quinta da Magantinha
description: In this wine estate which is also a bed and breakfast, you can take advantage of closed and secure parking. Sufficient space for motorhome, van, car. A breakfast can be offered to you. Send a message to find out availability before coming.

title: (4850) Lapa - Unnamed Road
description: Senhora da Lapa Church. Quiet parking with grassy flat. Most: a beautiful trail to climb the viewpoint with exceptional views. No service. To access it, go through the village of Soutelo.

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Nova
description: Parking of the cemetery behind, not perfectly flat but quiet with a nice view.

title: (4860) Arco de Baúlhe - 13 N210-1
description: Parking at the bottom of a dead end with no traffic, next to a small train museum (free). Very good for an evening and a night. Toilet open from 10h to 19h

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho
description: We went to Mondim de Basto during the first week of August.  The campers service area was closed (but possible to use the services) and we slept at this spot close to the urban park. Very quite, in the city center and with lots of entertainment for kids.

address.street: 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho

title: (4880-258) Mondim de Basto - 183 Rua da Quinta
title_short: (4880-258) Mondim de Basto - 183 Rua da Quinta
description: Car wash station and laundromat at the Intermarché. Ideal for parking

name: Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
title: (4890-140) Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
description: An incredibly idyllic campsite on a river, far away from civilisation. The last part of the path that leads there is only gravel and quite steep in some places. Also the last 3 km of directions from google maps is not correct but there are signs pointing the right way. The owner is Dutch and built everything here piece by piece, because previously there were only terraced vineyards here.

title: () Mondim de Basto - EM1189
description: Free service terminal with possibility to stay 72h, attention not accessible the first weekend of August cause big party on the parking lot. Free electricity, do not overuse.

title: () Mosteiro -
description: Very nice picnic/lunch stop by a bridge and a running stream

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Pont Medieval
description: Small car park allowing access to a natural swimming pool, 20m below. The place is idyllic. Please note that the street is narrow and suitable only for vans

name: Camping Mondim de Basto
title: () Camping Mondim de Basto
description: Very pleasant campsite full of nature possibility of service around the toilets. no pool but possibility of swimming at the river

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 112 Rua Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (4600-752) Amarante - 112 Rua Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Quiet park. Exists near a big super market, and a restaurant. Very near of N15 road. Safe park and very well iluminated.

title: (4830) Frades - N103
description: Small water fountain on the street. Easily accessible

title: (4715-616) Braga - 88 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 88 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description:
Shady earth parking accessible to any size motorhome with garbage cans and toilets a point to eat closed on March 28, 2023 many quiet picnic tables for the night 200 meters from the sanctuary of Our Lady of Sameiro
It is one of the most visited places of Marian devotion in Portugal

title: (4830) - N103
description: Lay-by at side of road with tree. Nice little spot but obviously close to the road.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description: Very large car park in front of the sanctuary, a little flatter than the neighboring car parks. Fountain and picnic tables nearby. The sanctuary rings from 7 o'clock.

title: (4600) - 521 Avenida Padre João Marques
description: A few places along a cobbled street with little traffic next to the old station which allows you to explore the greenway by bike. No service but a restaurant next door.

title: (4715) Braga - Av. da Igreja
description: Free and quiet parking. There are rubbish bins and a playground with WC. Drinking water source in the park but it is not good for recharging water. Next to the cemetery and with little traffic. The main parking spaces are too small for large motorhomes but these could be parked next to the playground.

title: (4890) Celorico de Basto - Unnamed Road
description: Nicely located place with tables & benches, small playground, a grill and drinking water. A path goes down to the river... The road 1.5 km (gravel) no asphalt in itself is OK but it goes steeply down and steeply up again

title: (4830) Rendufinho - 33 EM597
description: Village picnic area with 3 very good stone picnic tables. It has two small garbage containers, a fountain, a children's play area and a barbecue. You can't swim in the pond but it is pleasant.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description: Public toilets with plenty of parking space, picnic table and the beautiful Nossa sanctuary

title: (4715-616) Braga - 15 Avenida do Santuārio
description: Place Authorized by the GNR (Local Authority) to stay overnight, the other parks do not allow us to stay overnight.

title: (4715) Braga - 3 N309
description: Parking near the sanctuary with many places.

title: (4715) Braga - N309
description: Amazing and very peaceful place. Lots of stone picnic benches. Right next to a pretty amazing church that is no longer in use with stunning views of all of Braga. Shady and flat places. A large space also with access to walks. It seems unlikely to be able to sleep on this place and yet we have the right to park where we want. There is room for many motorhomes and for all types despite a bumpy path going up in the ground.

title: (4705) Esporões - Unnamed Road
description: On top of a mountain with very nice views and plenty of parking spots. There are chapels, there is a big monument and picknick benches all around. We we're here on 1st of January 2020 and there were locals going for walks at daytime, but at nighttime it was very quiet. Good and safe place! No services in winter. Looks like in summer it could be more active.

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description:
Amazing Parque/picnic area.
benches
barbecue
toilet
shade
water filling spot

title: () Braga - N309
description:
Water point. 
Seems to be fresh and clear.

title: (4705) Esporões -
description:
Lightly accessible by vans, fully accessible 4x4. NOT accessible by motorhome.

Incredible view, no street noise

title: (4600) Amarante - 1012 N210
description: Park near municipality stadium. Easy to park. Exists a restaurant at the local.

name: Camping Cabreira Park
title: (4850-073) Camping Cabreira Park
description: Campsite Cabreira Park! Shaded campsite surrounded by a stream, unmarked pitches, flat areas, service options, restaurant and swimming pool.

title: (4700) Braga - N309
description: Small area of land on one side of the road with panoramic views of the city of Braga. It is on the side of the road so it can be noisy, although it is a road that does not have much traffic.

title: (4600-593) - 19 Rua José Moura Bastos
description: Tony Restaurant private parking. After an excellent dinner, we asked if we could stay in the restaurant's parking lot and the permit was given with no problem, a quiet place near the Amarante water park

title: (4715) Braga - 8 Caminho do Sameiro
description:
Another parking lot at the Bom Jesus. There is an automatic gate. We asked a park guard and he admitted we could stay for some days. 
At the park you'll find picnic tables, small lake with boats, playground, bar with sandwiches, ice cream and free toilets.

title: (4850) Cerdeirinhas - 48 Avenida Entroncamento
description: Good easy parking close to Adelaide, best restaurant in the area. Mandatory stop on the way to Geres for cod or ribs

title: () - Rua de Portela
description: On top of a mountain with fantastic view. Some tables provided, plenty space. Perfect for sunset and sunrise. Good to stay for a night. Follow the sign "Miradouro" at N103, 2 km on a pebble stone road to the top.

name: Amarante camping
title: (4600-099) Amarante camping
description: Very nice Camping in a pine forest all amenities.

title: (4715) Braga - Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus
title_short: (4715) Braga - Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus
description: Parking spot in Bom Jezus area in Braga.

address.street: Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus

title: (4715) Braga - Largo do Arco
description: Parking day and night, possibility to take the funicular to go to visit Bom Jesus.

title: (4600-021) Amarante - LUGAR DA CHENTUADA
description: Laundromat in the intermarché car park. Possibility to check tire pressure free of charge.

title: (4715) Braga - 77 Estrada de São Pedro
description:
Car park for the Bom Jesus sanctuary funicular. Come in the evening after closing to have a free space. About 5 comfortable places under the trees. close to the ascent of the sanctuary on foot with its 577 steps. A magnificent sunset at the top.
Self-service/free/no amenities parking. peaceful for the night. Pure vida!

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Shaded picnic area with water

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 121 Rua Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: Parking area. 1 minute walk from town. Very quiet area, with bakery, restaurants nearby. We spent one night, no noise.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 166 Largo Santa Marinha
description: Perfect equipped beach for hot days.

title: (4620-696) Lousada - 1 Rua General Humberto Delgado
description:
Only Vehicles <3500 kg

Paved and illuminated parking lot (50x200 mtr) in the center of Lousada.  Opposite municipal swimming pool and fresh market.  Slightly inclined and close to a traffic road.  Lots of high trees.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima
title_short: (4600-752) Amarante - 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima
description: A pretty spot by a rivers by a thermal bathroom and Spa which you must book to find a spot (we didn’t). Probably space for 5 vans. Felt safe and isolated, really beautiful spot with a view to a town and a nearly electric charging spot and the toilets of the thermal bath.

address.street: 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima

title: (4600-015) Amarante - 552 Avenida Alexandre Herculano
description: Parking for the joggers and walkers. Certainly not suitable for more than 4 campers, otherwise no place for visitors' cars. Peacefully quiet. Entrance from 1 side can be difficult for longer motorhomes. quiet location at night.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 541 Largo Santa Marinha
description:
Small car park directly on the dead end river.
It is sloping. You can reach the village by following the river on a landscaped and very pretty path. On foot or by bike. Nice visit in the city

title: (4600-758) Amarante - 167 Rua Cândido dos Reis
description:
Park very well located, very close to the city, next to the river. Bar next door. departure of walk.
a little movement during the day but no worries.

title: (4600-005) Amarante - Avenida Primeiro de Maio
description:
Car park with overnight stays tolerated.
Next to Municipal Market and Market Café. Not possible on market days (Wednesday and Saturday from 04:00 - 15:00.

There are public toilets open from 08:00-20:00 and water may be available inside the market.

Lovely setting beside the river with easy access to the historic town.

Approach car park from the main road bridge. Do not let your GPS try to take you via the old bridge as the turn into the parking is nearly impossible even for our 5m van!

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
description: At an altitude of almost 1000m, the view is breathtaking at 360° over the entire region. Lots of people during the day on weekends. We spent a solitary and very quiet night. It is a starting point for paragliding.

title: (4600-014) Amarante - 374 Avenida Alexandre Herculano
description: Large free car park with spaces along the Tâmega River. Surrounded by two busy roads but quieter from midnight. Fine for one night. Trash cans in the parking lot.

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of a pretty little church, with a beautiful lighting of the church at night. Parking without lamppost.

title: (4600) Amarante - 167 Rua das Carvalhinhas
description: Good shady parking spot. Toilets open at the end of the dirt parking section (closed in Aug 12 for a music event set up). Noisy at the weekend. Close to the river

title: (4715-249) Braga - 9/9A Avenida Robert Smith
description: Self serve laundry in the covered parking of Minho Shopping Centre. 2.5m height limit for undercover parking, 2.2m height limit for parking directly above, however parking lot just opposite next to car wash and fuel station with no height limit. Cash only (notes and coins) - or download the app to pay by phone. Discount card available for slight discount. Toilet, WiFi and multiple shopping possibilities in shopping centre above while you wait.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 401 N210
description: Ample parking for large vehicles such as trucks, motorhomes, campers ... The ground is dirty but it is a place where you can park both to visit the city and to spend the night. It has no services. Next to it are the municipal swimming pools. Youth movement at night.

name: Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
title: (4860) Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
title_short: (4860) Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
description: Quinta Rural, is located just before the town of Juguelhe. Beautiful camping farm with fantastic views over the valley and a nice hostess. Please call in advance if you want to come.

title: (4600) Amarante - 338 N210
description: Place to spend the day or overnight. There is only space for 2 long motorhomes (7 meters), but the place is quiet, 10 minutes walk from the city center. If you can't find another place to park or sleep, this may be an alternative.

title: (4850) - 141 CM1409
description: Small quiet parking lot. Located near the town of Vieira, this place is rather flat, access is difficult for campsites. Easily accessible to commercial vehicles. The point of view is pleasant. Attention no water point or electricity. Have a good stay.

title: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
title_short: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
description: Nice little parking lot in paved ground Very quiet I only stayed for lunch but I'm sure we can stay the night No service hard this parking lot

address.street: 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha

title: (4710-057) Braga - 24 Rua Velha de Barros
description: Water Fountain

title: (4715-343) Braga - 79 Rua José António Cruz
description: “Ja Abriu” - Laundry - Self service. Very clean. 1 x 11kg and 1 x 18kg washing machines. 3 x drying machines. There is also ironing and clothes alteration service.

title: (4715-279) Braga - 26 Rua António de Mariz
description: Makro retail supermarket parking lot. It has many parking spaces.

title: (4620) Rio Tinto - 342 N207-2
description: Simple parking 250 m from Caide train station to take the train to Pinhao. Departure 8:50 arrival 11:37. Return departure 16h23 arrival 18h25. The train runs along the Douro on 85% of the way, beautiful! And in the opposite direction Porto is 40 minutes.

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto -
description: Quiet place for one night. The descent here is a bit steep and narrow, but also manageable with larger vehicles. A little further down is a river that is safe to use for cooling off in summer. You can start various hikes from here and the trees also offer shade. The night was extremely quiet, almost no cars drive along here.

title: (4710-404) Braga - 39 Avenida dos Lusíadas
description: Free public parking. Without services. A little away from the center (20 minutes on foot to the Cathedral) but very useful during the month of June, because with the parties it is impossible to park in the center.

title: (4880) - EM1347
description: Picnic Area of Ponte dos Cavacos

title: (4715) Braga - Rua Doutor Humberto Soeiro
description: Alternative location. Easy and good parking. 1 km from the historical center. Quiet place.

title: (4715-213) Braga - 19 Rua da Fábrica
description: Free park, day and night, all vehicles. Near playground, near cycling line to city center. 20 minutes walking and 5min bus stop to city center. Shadow or sun, night lighting, safe place, near shopping  centre. Public wc. But a bit noisy from the roads.

title: (4600) Amarante - N15
description: Motorhome wash stations and gas station.

title: (4715-009) Braga -
description: Picnic area with parking places near the Ecovia (green way), around 10 min walking to the city centre. Just beside Rio Este (East River, a tiny river that passes through Braga but you can't see in the map.) The green way continues west from this point and reaches the park (S.Joao da Ponte) and east reaching a sports complex with public toilets. (Rodovia). there are drinking water spots all allong the Ecovia.

title: (4715-213) Braga - 37 Rua Santo Adrião
description: Parking of the adventure park, away from the city, about 10 minutes by car. Calm. Cafeteria and activity park

title: (4710-340) Braga - 157 Rua da Quinta da Armada
title_short: (4710-340) Braga - 157 Rua da Quinta da Armada
description: Parking to go to Braga Parque 2 minutes on foot, secure enough we parked there 2 afternoons without worries.

title: (4830) - Rua de Fradelos
description: It's a parking lot of an (old) soccer field, near the street but there are very few people and cars. The next village is far enough to have a quite night.

title: (4600) Fregim - R. do Tâmega
description: It is the aquapark car park but since we have tickets for the next day I asked if we could spend the night and they told me without problem! Super spacious and super quiet.

title: (4715-213) Braga - Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires
title_short: (4715-213) Braga - Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires
description:
Parking in front of a medical center.  Place paying for the day. Night not recommended because there is a disco: 'Sardinha Biba' from midnight to 7am. Not good.
The oder side of the street, its possible, near scool. Free.

address.street: Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires

title: (4715-122) BRAGA - Praceta André Soares
description:
Free and quuet parking, with secure location. Near the entrance hall of the André Soares school. 
500 meters from the historic center.
In school period, better arrive after 18h.
Good for weekends.
Park back on the grass.

title: (4705) Braga - Avenida Doutor Francisco Pires Gonçalves
title_short: (4705) Braga - Avenida Doutor Francisco Pires Gonçalves
description: Free public park. Close to the historical center (600 meters). Avoid days of heavy rain and wind. Complicated in the month of June - Festivities of the city - São João and in the days of weekly fair (Tuesday). Easy access to sunrise or sunset. Local with some noise. Lots of shade in the summer.

name: Camping Braga
title: () Camping Braga
description: Small, very basic campsite with access to the municipal swimming pool directly below. Ideal for visiting the historic center. Device for emptying the motorhome. The campsite is well shaded. Friendly staff. Places for mobile homes and tents, wooden cabins. Good to start. Sanitary building in the upper part of the square is clean, but outdated. New sanitary building in the lower part of the square was great. Cooking areas, ovens, rental refrigerators. 5 Stars.

title: (4715-005) Braga - 37 Praça Araújo Carandá
description: Laundromat

title: (4850) Vieira do Minho - Unnamed Road
description: Excellent parking. Quiet place with a beautiful view of Geres. The road to reach it is unpaved and disconnected but practicable (we did it with a city car). We did not meet anyone except three motorcyclists.

title: () - N205
description: Near the medieval bridge. Along the river. Flat and very beautiful. Not very easy to access, especially for a motorhome. A bit noisy with a traffic lane nearby.

title: (4710-487) Braga -
description: Flat illuminated parking spaces of approximately 5.50 m each. on a quiet road. At the rear a supermarket and a pasteleria.

title: () - EM595-1
description: Small car park next to the river, in Praia fluvial quinta do rio. Parking for two motorhomes. No services.

title: (4705-097) Braga - 130 Rua do Fujacal
description: Self service laundry

title: (4705-185) Braga - 3 Travessa da Ilha
description: Self Service Laundry at Intermarche Braga.

title: (4700-034) Braga - 523 Avenida da Imaculada Conceição
description:
It is Lidl parking.
Very good spot to walk to the center of Braga, it is only 10 minutes and you do not have to enter narrow streets

title: (4705-259) Braga - 37 Rua dos Presidentes
description: Really great laundry!
